BBAG.title: Developing a Reactive Website for a Non-Profit DEI Organization
objectives: Minimize startup expenses by developing the site without 3rd-party services.
Ensure that users can easily and securely join and donate to organization.
Display recent content from the organizationâ€™s social media account.

arm.title: Designing a Full Anthropromorphic Robotic Hand
objectives: Design a hand that replicates the ranges of motion of a real hand using ten motors.
Map the natural DOF of the human hand to determine which DOFs are interdependent.
Construct the hand and perform strength, speed, and reliability testing.

Pump.title: Developing & Demonstrating a Cyclical Aspiration Pump
objectives: Develop a vacuum regulator that is compatible with any commercially sold vacuum pump and can achieve a cycle frequency of at least 5 Hz.
Develop a cyclical vacuum pump system with a vacuum pressure of at least 29 inHg.
